title: Expose a Deployment with ClusterIP Service
description: Create a ClusterIP Service named ||web-svc|| that exposes the ||web-deploy|| Deployment on port ||80||.

validations.command: kubectl get service web-svc -n jupiter -o jsonpath='{.spec.type}'
kubectl get service web-svc -n jupiter -o jsonpath='{.spec.ports[0].port}'
kubectl get endpoints web-svc -n jupiter -o jsonpath='{.subsets[0].addresses[0].targetRef.name}' | grep -q web-deploy
validations.description: Service should have endpoints from web-deploy pods
